questions.question: In Tic-Tac-Toe, if we don't use depth as parameter while mapping to graph, then which of the follwoing will be true?

answers.b: We will terminate quickly as compared to when we use depth

questions.question: Alpha beta pruning is used for?

answers.a: Reducing number of nodes that are considered
answers.c: Mostly useful when large number of states such as in chess
